## Mehulkumar Shiroya  
**Ph.D. Researcher | Silicon Tracking Detectors | Heavy-Ion Physics**

I work on the **Silicon Tracking System (STS)** for the **Compressed Baryonic Matter (CBM)** experiment at FAIR (GSI Darmstadt).  
My research connects **silicon detector characterization**, **simulation geometry**, and **high-rate tracking performance** for heavy-ion collisions.

## About Me

- Silicon microstrip sensor **optical inspection** & defect mapping  
- Sensor characterization: implant break, open passivation, dust, pad damage  
- Image processing workflows to locate and classify surface defects  
- Detector R&D aligned with CBM high-rate environment
